other_tests.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. A calcified granuloma in the left lobe measuring up to 0.8 cm, and several simple cysts throughout the liver. The gallbladder is distended containing sludge and stones, located at the gallbladder neck, with mild gallbladder wall thickening and edema. No intrahepatic biliary dilation and no ascites.
